Author: FinneasHayes
EnhancedContent: This situation occurs after using the computer for a while, and only some icons and text are lost, while others are displayed normally. Generally, everything within the app is normal, but folders and menus are lost. Restarting the computer will fix the problem. What is the reason for this?
Title: Text and icons are missing in Windows 10 system.
Description: This situation occurs after using the computer for a while, and only some icons and text are lost, while others are displayed normally. Generally, everything within the app is normal, but folders and menus are lost. Restarting the computer will fix the problem. What is the reason for this?
